TextView.android:text: This app is intended to show stats and allow comparisons of the 100 greatest players in the history of professional tennis. Currently there are 30 players in the app, with the next 70 players on the way in the next few updates. To use the app, scroll through the players, click on one to show stats, and click compare to compare with another players stats. The app uses Firebase to store photos and the text data about the players.
